meta.title: Welcome Garage - Crazy Parking Jam
meta.description: Welcome to Crazy Parking Jam - the most exciting car parking puzzle game. Test your skills and become a parking master!

hero.title: Crazy Parking Jam
hero.description: Navigate through challenging parking puzzles, unlock new levels, and become the ultimate parking master in this addictive puzzle game!

steps.title: Choose Your Level
steps.description: Start with easy parking challenges and progress to more complex puzzles as you improve your skills.

steps.title: Plan Your Moves
steps.description: Analyze the parking lot and plan your strategy to move cars efficiently and clear the path.

steps.title: Solve the Puzzle
steps.description: Move cars strategically to create a path for the target vehicle to exit the parking lot.

steps.title: Earn Rewards
steps.description: Complete levels to earn stars, unlock new cars, and discover special power-ups to help you solve tougher challenges.

testimonials.text: This is the most addictive parking game I've ever played! The puzzles are challenging but not impossible, and I love the graphics.
testimonials.author: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.title: Casual Gamer

testimonials.text: Crazy Parking Jam has become my go-to game during my commute. It's the perfect mix of fun and brain exercise!
testimonials.author: Michael Chen
testimonials.title: Puzzle Enthusiast

testimonials.text: I've tried many parking games, but this one stands out with its unique levels and smooth controls. Highly recommended!
testimonials.author: Emma Rodriguez
testimonials.title: Mobile Gaming Blogger

items.title: Realistic Car Physics
items.description: Experience highly responsive and intuitive controls that simulate real-world car handling for a more immersive challenge.

items.title: Variety of Vehicles
items.description: From compact cars to stretch limos and fire trucks – adapt your parking strategy to the vehicle you’re driving.

items.title: Dynamic Obstacles
items.description: Navigate around cones, barriers, and even rogue AI vehicles as the difficulty ramps up with each level.

items.name: Parking Pro
items.description: Successfully completed 50 levels without a single collision.

items.name: Speed Racer
items.description: Finished a level in under 2 minutes.

items.name: Master Planner
items.description: Solved 10 puzzles using the minimum number of moves.
